items.sentence: You shouldn't allow your son to act like a selfish brat.

Tom will probably not be able to persuade Mary to drive.
Tom promised that he'd help us, but I don't believe him.
The shirt that Tom was wearing didn't fit him very well.
I didn't feel comfortable because I didn't speak French.
Convenience stores are more expensive than supermarkets.
Passing the blame on to someone else isn't the solution.

I couldn't sleep well last night, because it was so hot.
